request.header: POST /LoyaltyMerchandisingService.svc HTTP/1.1 Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8 Cache-Control: no-cache SOAPAction: "http://www.gamestop.com/services/csl/loyaltyprogram/contracts/2010/05/ILoyaltyMerchandisingService/GetMerchandisedProductDetails" User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; MS Web Services Client Protocol 1.1.4322.2032) Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Accept: */* Connection: Keep-Alive Host: cslloyaltyprogramservicesqa1.testgs.pvt Content-Length: 1249

response.header: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 2357 Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8 Server: Microsoft-IIS/8.5 Date: Wed, 22 Feb 2017 16:49:50 GMT
response.body: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <s:Body> <GetMerchandisedProductDetailsResponse xmlns="http://www.gamestop.com/services/csl/loyaltyprogram/contracts/2010/05"> <GetMerchandisedProductDetailsResult xmlns:a="http://www.gamestop.com/services/csl/loyaltyprogram/contracts/messages/2010/11" xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <a:Product xmlns:b="http://www.gamestop.com/services/csl/loyaltyprogram/contracts/entities/2010/11"> <b:Active>true</b:Active> <b:CatalogEndDate>2011-01-31T13:05:00</b:CatalogEndDate> <b:CatalogNewDate i:nil="true" /> <b:CatalogStartDate>2010-11-05T13:05:00</b:CatalogStartDate> <b:CategoryType>Coupon</b:CategoryType> <b:ClearanceFlag>false</b:ClearanceFlag> <b:ComingSoonFlag>false</b:ComingSoonFlag> <b:ExpirationDate i:nil="true" /> <b:FreeShippingFlag>false</b:FreeShippingFlag> <b:FullDescription>PS3 Real Triggers from PDP add extra grip to your L2 and R2 buttons on your PS3 Dual Shock 3 controller. Never lose an intense fire fight again because of your slippery trigger fingers. Printable Coupon for In-Store Pickup. Not valid in Puerto Rico. </b:FullDescription> <b:LargeImageURL i:nil="true" /> <b:LegalText>Notice to residents of Puerto Rico: Due to advertising restrictions imposed by the Puerto Rico Department of Consumer Affairs, some coupons are not available for use in Puerto Rico. Please see each coupon for eligibility and more details. </b:LegalText> <b:LimitedEditionFlag>false</b:LimitedEditionFlag> <b:NumberOfEntries i:nil="true" /> <b:PointCost>4000</b:PointCost> <b:ProductVariants> <b:ProductVariant> <b:Quantity>1</b:Quantity> <b:Sku>334</b:Sku> <b:VariantDescription>Sony PS3 Real Triggers </b:VariantDescription> </b:ProductVariant> </b:ProductVariants> <b:RestrictedStates xmlns:c="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" /> <b:RewardID>390163</b:RewardID> <b:ShortDescription>One Free Sony PS3 Real Triggers </b:ShortDescription> <b:SmallImageURL>https://www.gamestop.com/gs/images/lpu/list/804017.png</b:SmallImageURL> <b:SoldOutThreshold>0</b:SoldOutThreshold> <b:SweepstakesId i:nil="true" /> <b:SweepstakesType i:nil="true" /> <b:TierReference i:nil="true" /> <b:Title>Sony PS3 Real Triggers</b:Title> </a:Product> <a:ResponseType>Success</a:ResponseType> </GetMerchandisedProductDetailsResult> </GetMerchandisedProductDetailsResponse> </s:Body> </s:Envelope>
